trans-unit.source: Specifies how a control will behave when its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*> property is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 지정 방법을 컨트롤이 동작 하는 경우 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>속성이 사용 되는지.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize*>

trans-unit.source: Setting the GrowAndShrink value produces the same behavior that you get for controls with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A> property enabled but which have no `AutoSizeMode` property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 컨트롤에 대 한 얻을 수 있는 같은 동작이 만들어집니다 GrowAndShrink 값 설정에서 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>속성이 설정 되었지만 `AutoSizeMode` 속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MinimumSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MaximumSize%2A> properties are respected, but the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MinimumSize%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MaximumSize%2A>의 현재 값을 제외한 속성은 적용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>속성은 무시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MaximumSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MinimumSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control grows or shrinks to fit its contents.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 증가 되거나 내용에 맞게 축소 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The control cannot be resized manually.
The control grows as much as necessary to fit its contents but does not shrink smaller than the value of its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*> property.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤이 내용에 맞게 필요에 따라 증가 하지만의 값 보다 작게 축소할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size*>

trans-unit.source: The form can be resized, but cannot be made so small that any of its contained controls are hidden.
trans-unit.target: 양식은 조정할 수 있는 있지만 숨겨져의 포함 된 컨트롤 작게 만들 수 없습니다.
